data.title: rated Kannada Movies of 2021
data.meta_description: Here are top 10 kannada movies of 2021.Watch Kannada movies on Guru IPTV.
data.text:
Many high-profile film releases have been postponed until 2021, thus we've compiled a list of the ten most eagerly anticipated forthcoming films. Yash's KGF Chapter 2, Darshan's Roberrt, Sudeep's Phantom, and Puneeth Rajkumar's Yuvarathnaa, James, and more Kannada films are on the list for 2021. These films are available on most popular OTTs if you haven't seen them yet. Ready? You can thank us afterwards.

1. KGF Chapter2: 9.7 This film is a sequel to the hit KGF, and it is a historical drama film set in the late 1970s, written and directed by Prashanth Neel, best known for his work on Ugramm. Yash plays Rocky Bhai, the key character in this film. Srinidhi Shetty played the female protagonist in this film, while Achyuth Kumar, Vasishta N. Simha, Anant Nag, Malavika Avinash, B Suresh, and others played supporting roles and gave their all to make the film a success.

2. Roberrt: 6.6 Raghava (Darshan), the protagonist character, is an ordinary cook who is attempting to live up to his cute son and teach him nonviolence in the action entertainer Roberrt, directed by Tharun Kishore Sudhir. He does, however, have dark secrets. There's a good explanation why he's now leading a good life. That is the explanation for this. What do you think his darkest secrets are? Is that his child? To learn everything, you must go watch the movies.

3. Phantom (Vikrant rona): NAAnup Bhandari's Vikrant Rona is an upcoming Indian Kannada-language fantasy action-adventure thriller film. It stars Kiccha Sudeep, Nirup Bhandari, and Neetha Ashok, who is making her acting debut.

4. Bhajarangi 2: 8.3 Bhajarangi 2 is the sequel to the blockbuster film Bhajarangi. It is an action entertainer directed by Harsha and produced by the Jayanna combines banner. Shiva Rajkumar and Bhavana star in the film, which is directed by Arjun Janya and features music by Arjun Janya. This family entertainer is likely to be a hit with both adults and kids.

5. Yuvarathanaa: 6.7 The principal who is fighting to keep government schools open, Even former college students came out in support of him. However, the villainous organisation intends to destroy the principal's effort, shut down government college students, and close the college. The rest of the storey is around a hero who uses all of his strength to defend a government college.

6. Pogaru: 5.4 Nanda Kishore directed and PK Gangadhar produced Pogaru, a romantic action entertaining film. Shiva (Dhruva Sarja) is a young man who despises his stepfather and is trying to find his biological mother. There are times when a young man who feels that ruthlessness is all about making money should be revered only under tyranny. Shiva's transformation from villain to hero should be seen in the cinema to learn what prompted this shift and how to stand out as a hero.

7. Kabza: NAR Chandru directs Kabzaa, a mass action entertainer film. Upendra and Sudeep play key roles in the film. Upendra and Sudeep play key roles in the film. Kabja will be released in seven languages.

8. MadhGaja: 6.4 S Mahesh Kumar has directed the romantic action entertainer MadhaGaja. Srimurali and Ashika Ranganath play prominent roles in the film. Ravi Basrur created the music, while I. Naveen Kumar shot the photography and Harish Komme edited the film. Umapathy Srinivasa Gowda produces the film under the Umapathy Films banner.

9. Bagheera: NA Bagheera is an action-comedy directed by Dr Suri and written by Prashanth Neel. Sri Murali plays the leading part in the film. Vijay Kiragandur, under the brand of Hombale Films, is producing the film.

10. Yuva Ranadheera Kanteerava: NA. Yuva Ranadheera Kanteerava is an action romance film directed by Puneeth Rudranag, the assistant director of KGF fame Prashanth Neel. Yuva Rajkumar marks his Sandalwood debut in this film. Ravi Basrur created the music, while Sanketh MYS shot the cinematography and Vijay Raj edited the film.
